post.summary:
Submit a vote for a specific topic at a location.
Returns the last added vote for the topic by the user. 
If user recently voted for the topic, that previous vote will be returned instead (disambiguate by timestamp). 
If this is a first time vote for the topic or last vote was long time ago, a new vote is added and returned in response.

Submit a batch of votes for a list of topics.
Returns the last added vote for each topic. 
If user recently voted for the topic, that previous vote will be returned instead (disambiguate by timestamp). 
If this is a first time vote for the topic or last vote was long time ago, a new vote is added and returned in response.
If the topic is expired, no vote is added and no vote is returned for the topic.
